title: [Large-Scale] Self-Regulated Engagement Assessment Strategies in Online Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Integration of VR simulation and self-directed learning activities in a smartphone-based restricted technology environment, emphasizing self-regulated learning strategies in engagement assessment

learning_goals: Learners can use self-assessment checklists that objectively record their participation patterns in VR simulation activities
Learners can set, adjust, and achieve specific weekly learning goals and participation criteria
Learners can analyze their participation levels multidimensionally through peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
